attributes.action: Let the law abiding people of the UK reclaim OUR streets
attributes.additional_details:
We need to grant the government and police emergency powers to stop this mindless looting, thieving, and lawlessness from ripping out the heart of our cities.
Support this if you believe that action is needed and needed NOW to put an end to this outrage.
Our brave Police officers, fire officers, and ambulance deserve our support, Its time the silent majority stand together and be counted.
